content: I think that's likely a copy/paste error on my part and the target isn't full enough to have caught that yet
removing that line for -pthread on wasip3 should be fine
er wait though you're working off Sy's branch, right?
If that's the case then it should be intentional since that branch has threading support
(but the branch is also a WIP)
Not working on anything, really, just trying to see what new triples are being introduced and what they mean
Eventually I will be doing some work on enabling threads in C# where I will need to know what triple to use
the current plan is that wasm32-wasip3 will, at least eventually, support threads
it may not initially depending on how all the development work lines up
Scott Waye has marked this topic as resolved.
